hard: Satori – Each time Orion gains energy Satori will apply Fox marks on him. When Satori has stacked his Fox marks and uses his active skill Orion will be one-shotted
Lian – Charms Orion once he hits her with his ultimate. Being charmed each time Orion uses his ultimate doesn’t allow him to stack his ultimate damage and finish off enemies.
soft: Magic defense artifact – Orion does a lot of magic damage, having a hero with a magic defense artifact will definitely help
Jorgen – Jorgen can deny a lot of energy gain for Orion
